#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdbool.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<list>
#include<limits.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long int

int main()
{
	string L,K;
	int i,T,j;
	cin>>T;
	while(T)
	{
		cin>>L;
		cin>>K;
		if(L.size()!=K.size()+1)
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
		else
		{
			j=0;
			for(i=0;i<K.size();i++)
			{
				if(K[i]!=L[j])
				{
					++j;
					if(K[i]!=L[j])
						break;
				}
				//cout<<K[i]<<" "<<L[j]<<endl;
				++j;
			}
			if(i==K.size())
				cout<<"1"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"0"<<endl;
		}
		--T;
	}
	return 0;
}
